author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-3294:  In contrib/clustering/lib/, replaced the manually retrowoven Java 1.5-compatible carrot2-core-3.5.0.jar (which is not publicly available, except from the Solr Subversion repository), with newly released Java 1.5-compatible carrot2-core-3.5.0.1.jar (hosted on the Maven Central repository).  Also updated dependencies jackson-core-asl and jackson-mapper-asl (both v1.5.2 -> v1.7.4).
